lead_paragraph: Accused of taking payment from an online game maker, the official, Jin Kyung-joon, is the most senior Korean prosecutor ever arrested while in office.

headline.print_headline: South Korean Prosecutor Arrested on Bribery Charges
headline.main: Top South Korean Prosecutor Arrested on Charges He Accepted Bribes

snippet: Accused of taking payment from an online game maker, the official, Jin Kyung-joon, is the most senior Korean prosecutor ever arrested while in office....
abstract: Senior South Korean prosecutor Jin Kyung-joon is arrested on corruption charges involving bribes offered by online game firm Nexon; case reflects South Korea's wider disgruntlement with misconduct among its leaders, and anxiety amid increasing income inequality.
